attributes.action: All parties and MPs work together to get the best deal possible for Brexit
attributes.background: MPs and parties need to, for once,  work as a team to deliver Brexit for the nation. Point-scoring and power plays by self-serving MPs is damaging the country. We elected you. Work for us, even if you disagree with Brexit as it now affects all of us. Time is running out.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for political parties and MPs, not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
